00015 using namespace std;
00017 class Backend {
00018 public:
00021     class Cursor {
00022     public:
00024         virtual ~Cursor() {}
00029         virtual void setCacheSize(int s) {}
00032         virtual Record fetchOne()=0;  
00033     };
00034     class Result {
00035     public:
00037         virtual ~Result() {}
00039         virtual size_t fieldNum() const=0;
00041         virtual Record fields() const=0;
00043         virtual size_t recordNum() const=0;
00045         virtual Records records() const=0;
00046 
00047     };
00049     virtual ~Backend() {}
00052     virtual bool supportsSequences() const {
00053         return false;
00054     }
00057     virtual string getRowIDType() const {
00058         return "INTEGER PRIMARY KEY";
00059     }
00062     virtual string getInsertID() const { return ""; }
00064     virtual void begin() const {}
00066     virtual void commit() const {}
00068     virtual void rollback() const {}
00072     virtual Result* execute(string query) const = 0;
00077     virtual Cursor* cursor(string query) const = 0;
00085     virtual string groupInsert(Record tables, Records fields, Records values,
00086                                string sequence) const;
00087 };
